text: Leif Carlsson (born February 18, 1965) is a Swedish former professional ice hockey defenceman. He is currently the general manager of the Färjestad BK of the Swedish Hockey League. Carlsson was selected by the Hartford Whalers in the 3rd round (61st overall) of the 1983 NHL Entry Draft. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:AIK IF players Category:Färjestad BK players Category:Hartford Whalers draft picks Category:Swedish ice hockey coaches Category:Swedish ice hockey defencemen Category:People from Ludvika Municipality
title: Leif Carlsson
